entries.name: Thermal Physiology
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight against objects and creatures with a tempture signature opposite of it's inviroment IE: hot signatures in cold enviroments or cold signatures in hot environments, but disadvantage against objects and creatures with a tempture signiture that matches the enviroment.

entries.name: Terrain Adaptation
entries: When you finish a long rest, you can choose to become adapted to one terrain type from the ranger's list of favored terrains. While in your adapted terrain, you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

entries.name: Natural Resilience
entries: You have resistance to poison damage.

entries.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest or jungle terrain.

entries.name: Predatory Ambush
entries: If you hit a creature with an attack roll, the creature takes an extra 1d4 damage if it hasn't taken a turn yet in the current combat.

entries.name: Urban Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in urban environments.

entries.name: Improvised Tactician
entries: You can use your bonus action to make a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a hidden creature or object, or to make an Intelligence (Investigation) check to deduce the workings of a trap or mechanism.

entries.name: Mentor's Presence
entries: When a friendly creature who can see you makes an attack roll or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to grant them advantage on the roll.

entries.name: Tactical Insight
entries: You have proficiency in the Insight and History skills.

entries.name: Environmental Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against extreme heat and cold.

entries.name: Survival Expert
entries: You have proficiency in the Survival skill.
